item.description:
Hi to All!

Our regular meetup date, the first Monday of the month is on Labor Day. There will be NO meet-up in September as a result. Next meetup will be October 6.

Planned for that date is to have a bankruptcy attorney come to talk about the newer rules in bankrupties, what a bankruptcy can accomplish and what it can't.

I have occasionally used a bankruptcy filing to help a client avoid an auction, when there has not been enough time to put together a short sale. And then done the short sale. A bankruptcy is better for them than a foreclosure! It can be a tool you want to know about in this real estate investing climate.

Warmest regards,
Annie
item.how_to_find_us: Come in and go down the stairs to our meeting room on the lower level.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club September Meetup
